DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Nigeria Calls Up Retired Oil Workers : The nation ' s official radio said Labor Minister Samuel Ogbemudia had directed former oil officials to register for work with a view to being offered jobs . The military government is fighting a six-week strike by oil workers who support Moshood Abiola as president . Union leaders have vowed to continue the strike , which has disrupted fuel deliveries and cut oil output by about 20 % .
